thread.title: Great hotel and so convenient
thread.title_full: Great hotel and so convenient - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Stavanger1
title: Great hotel and so convenient
text: This was our third visit to the Nadler Soho, and once again we had a great stay. The staff were friendly and helpful as always and the location is so convenient for Oxford Street, Covent Garden and Theatreland. One tip - because of one way restrictions taxis often have to go the long way round to get to the hotel, which can put up the fare considerably. It is often cheaper to get them to drop you on Oxford Street and then take a two minute walk round the corner.
